text: "When Will I Be Loved" is a 1960 song by The Everly Brothers. It was a top ten hit in Australia, the United Kingdom and the United States. It went on to be a bigger hit for Linda Ronstadt in 1974. It was taken from her fifth studio album Heart Like a Wheel. Category:1960 songs Category:Linda Ronstadt songs Category:The Everly Brothers songs Category:Little River Band songs
title: When Will I Be Loved (song)
